verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%G106>bread,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> drew <S%G1448>near.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might put <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G337>death,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> who was <S%G1941>surnamed<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> who <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G706>numbered<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> went <S%G565>away,<s%> and <S%G4814>talked<s%> with the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4755>captains<s%> about <S%G4459>how<s%> he might <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G846>them.<s%>
<S%G2532>They<s%> were <S%G5463>glad,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4934>agreed<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G694>money.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1843>consented,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> an <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> in the absence <S%G817>of<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude.<s%>
<S%G2064>The<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of unleavened <S%G1722>bread<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G2380>sacrificed.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G4198>"Go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> for <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G5315>eat.<s%>"
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> do <S%G2309>you<s%> want us to <S%G2090>prepare?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> when <S%G5216>you<s%> have <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G941>carrying<s%> a <S%G2765>pitcher<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G4876>will<s%> <S%G4876>meet<s%> <S%G5213>you.<s%> <S%G190>Follow<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3757>which<s%> he <S%G1531>enters.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2046>Tell<s%> the <S%G1320>master<s%> of the <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G1320><s%> 'The Teacher <S%G2046>says<s%> to <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the guest <S%G2646>room,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I may <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3101>disciples?<s%>"'
<S%G2548>He<s%> will <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> a <S%G3173>large,<s%> <S%G4766>furnished<s%> upper <S%G508>room.<s%> Make <S%G2090>preparations<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>"
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G565>went,<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> things <S%G2531>as<s%> he had <S%G2046>told<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2090>prepared<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3753>When<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> sat <S%G377>down<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G652>apostles.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> "I have <S%G1939>earnestly<s%> <S%G1939>desired<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G3958>suffer,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G5315>will<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> longer by any means <S%G5315>eat<s%> of it <S%G2193>until<s%> it is <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> a <S%G4221>cup,<s%> and when he had given <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1266>share<s%> it among <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3756>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3754>you,<s%> <S%G3756>I<s%> <S%G4095>will<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> at all again from the <S%G1081>fruit<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G288>vine,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> and when he had given <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> he <S%G2806>broke<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>"This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%> <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G364>memory<s%> of <S%G1699>me.<s%>"

<S%G5615>Likewise,<s%> <S%G2532>he<s%> took the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1172>supper,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5124>"This<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> is the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1632>poured<s%> out <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%>
<S%G4133>But<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of him <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3860>betrays<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5132>table.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G4198>goes,<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> it has been <S%G3724>determined,<s%> <S%G4133>but<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> to <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%>"

<S%G846>They<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G4802>question<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G687><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> it <S%G1498>was<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G4238>do<s%> this <S%G5124>thing.<s%>

<S%G1161>There<s%> arose <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G5379>contention<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> <S%G1380>considered<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G3187>greatest.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "The <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G2961>lord<s%> it over <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> have authority <S%G1850>over<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> are <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2110><s%> 'benefactors.'

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> with <S%G5210>you.<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> one <S%G3588>who<s%> is the <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> let him <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G3501>younger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> one who is <S%G2233>governing,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1247>serves.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G3187>greater,<s%> one <S%G3588>who<s%> sits at the <S%G345>table,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> one <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1247>serves?<s%> <S%G3780>Isn't<s%> it he <S%G3588>who<s%> sits at the <S%G345>table?<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1722>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1247>serves.<s%>
But <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> have <S%G1265>continued<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3986>trials.<s%>
<S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G1303>confer<s%> on <S%G5213>you<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1303>conferred<s%> on <S%G3427>me,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5132>table<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%> <S%G2532>You<s%> will <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G2919>judging<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4613>"Simon,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1809>asked<s%> to have <S%G5209>you,<s%> that he might <S%G4617>sift<s%> you <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4621>wheat,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1189>prayed<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G4675>you,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3361>wouldn't<s%> <S%G1587>fail.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4218>You,<s%> when once <S%G4771>you<s%> have turned <S%G1994>again,<s%> <S%G4741>establish<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>"

He <S%G2036>said,<s%> "I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> the rooster <S%G5455>will<s%> by <S%G3364>no<s%> means <S%G5455>crow<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> <S%G4250>until<s%> <S%G2228>you<s%> <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G4250>that<s%> you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> three <S%G5151>times.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3753>"When<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> out <S%G817>without<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4082>wallet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5266>shoes,<s%> did <S%G5302>you<s%> <S%G3361>lack<s%> <S%G5100>anything?<s%>" <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3762>"Nothing.<s%>"

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>he<s%> said to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G235>"But<s%> <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G3588>whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G905>purse,<s%> let him <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> and <S%G3668>likewise<s%> a <S%G4082>wallet.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>Whoever<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>none,<s%> <S%G59><s%> let him <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>cloak,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> buy a <S%G3162>sword.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2089>still<s%> be <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me:<s%> <S%G2532><s%> 'He was <S%G3049>counted<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G459>transgressors.<s%>' <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> which <S%G4012>concerns<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G5056>end.<s%>"

<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> are <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3162>swords.<s%>" <S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "That <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2425>enough.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> came <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G4198>went,<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> his <S%G1485>custom<s%> <S%G1519>was,<s%> to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5117>place,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Pray <S%G4336>that<s%> you <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>He<s%> was <S%G645>withdrawn<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%>'s <S%G1000>throw,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G5087>knelt<s%> <S%G1119>down<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G1014>willing,<s%> <S%G3911>remove<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%> <S%G4133>Nevertheless,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4674>yours,<s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>"
<S%G1161>An<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1765>strengthening<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096>Being<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G74>agony<s%> he <S%G4336>prayed<s%> more <S%G1617>earnestly.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G2402>sweat<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> great <S%G2361>drops<s%> of <S%G129>blood<s%> falling <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he rose <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> his <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2837>sleeping<s%> <S%G575>because<s%> of <S%G3077>grief,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do <S%G2518>you<s%> <S%G450>sleep?<s%> Rise and <S%G4336>pray<s%> that <S%G2518>you<s%> may not <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation.<s%>"

<S%G1161>While<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> was <S%G4281>leading<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> came <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G5368>kiss<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
